#Text=FIFA World Cup 2018 semifinals : Croatia sends England home , 2-1
#Text=Friday , July 13 , 2018
#Text=On Wednesday , Croatia defeated England 2 – 1 in the semi-final of the 2018 FIFA Football World Cup with Mario Mandžukić scoring the winning goal in the additional time .
#Text=With this victory , Croatia is in their first-ever FIFA World Cup finals , and they are to face France on Sunday .
#Text=Croatia had greater ball possession in the match .
#Text=Croatian midfielder Luka Modrić committed a foul early in the game , and Dele Alli won a freekick for England in the 4th minute .
#Text=Kieran Trippier scored from the freekick , giving England an early lead in the match .
#Text=In the 14th minute , Harry Maguire came close to doubling the lead for England , but missed .
#Text=Ivan Perišić and Ante Rebić tried to equalise soon after , but were unsuccessful .
#Text=In the 30th minute , English striker Harry Kane was caught offside from Jesse Lingard 's through ball .
#Text=Raheem Sterling and Šime Vrsaljko also tried their luck before the end of the first half .
#Text=The first half ended with England having a one-goal advantage .
#Text=Just three minutes into the second half , Croatia 's forward Mario Mandžukić was yellow-carded .
#Text=In the 54th minute , English defender Kyle Walker was also booked .
#Text=Just after the one-hour mark , Ivan Rakitić missed a chance to level for Croatia .
#Text=In the 68th minute , Croatia got the equalising goal as Perišić scored from Šime Vrsaljko 's assist .
#Text=England made a substitution in the 74th minute when Marcus Rashford came on for Sterling .
#Text=The second half ended with both sides tied , 1 – 1 .
#Text=At the beginning of the additional time , England made another change ; Ashley Young was taken off for Danny Rose .
#Text=Ivan Strinić was injured and Croatia made a substitution in the 95th minute , replacing him with Josip Pivarić .
#Text=The referee booked Rebić in the 96th minute and he was later replaced by Andrej Kramarić in the 101st minute .

#Text=Mario Mandžukić came to Croatia 's rescue in the 109th minute , scoring from close range from Perišić 's assist , which Jordan Pickford could not prevent from going to the back of the English net .
#Text=Jamie Vardy came on for Walker in the 112th minute .
#Text=Mandžukić injured himself and Vedran Ćorluka came on for him in the 115th minute .
#Text=Croatia prevented England from getting an equaliser as the match ended 2 – 1 and Croatia advanced to their first-ever FIFA football World Cup final .
#Text=After the match , England 's coach Gareth Southgate said , " At the moment we all feel the pain of defeat .

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text=He also added , saying ,  You have to suffer the result first sometimes .

_	_	_	_

#Text=Croatian coach Zlatko Dalić said ,  Nobody wanted to give in when I was preparing the first eleven , nobody wanted to say I was not ready in extra time , no one wanted to be subbed and this shows character and what makes me proud .
